example.name: Name of garment that will appear on store page and preview
example.id: id can be any number as long as it matches the name of the images and is unique to other products
example.price: can be any number, add two decimal numbers even if theyre zero in the form 123.00
example.size: should be the size of the garment as ONE LETTER CAPITALIZED (or two as in extras like XL or XXS), will appear on store page and preview. should be the size in the tags array
example.condition: just put he condition of the garment for example, Used - Excellent
example.material: list of materials seperated by commas NOT AN ARRAY
example.style: list of styles seperated by commas NOT AN ARRAY
example.tags: SHOULD BE AN ARRAY of strings that represent tags. If its a dress add 'dress' (with double quotes) so it appears when the user filters by 'dress'
example.images: SHOULD BE AN ARRAY of accending numbers starting at 1 representing the number of images for THIS product. Exmaple: [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] would be 5 images
example.description: any description, can be as long as you want
